summary: This document is an email correspondence between Paul Morris and Caroline Kitidis regarding a meeting agenda for an upcoming meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes instructions for preparing materials for the meeting and highlights the roles of the individuals involved at Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 21, 2013.
Paul Morris and Caroline Kitidis are both Managing Directors at Deutsche Bank.
The email discusses preparations for a meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline Kitidis requests a professional version of the meeting agenda on Deutsche Bank letterhead.
Several individuals are cc'd in the email, indicating a collaborative effort in the meeting preparations.
